com.ibm.team.workitem.common.model

Interface IWorkItemReferences


  • public interface IWorkItemReferences
    References from a work item to other items and artifacts.
    Since:
    0.5
    See Also:
    IReference, IEndPointDescriptor

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String REFERENCES_PROPERTY
      The references property, used in events.

    • Method Summary

      Deletes an attachment from the repository.

      Returns the list of end point descriptors of which references exist.

      Returns true iff references of the given end point descriptor exist.

      Removes the given reference.

      Removes all references from the given end point descriptor and adds the given reference if not null.

      • hasReferences

        boolean hasReferences(com.ibm.team.links.common.registry.IEndPointDescriptor endPointDescriptor)
        Returns true iff references of the given end point descriptor exist.
        Parameters:
        endPointDescriptor - the end point descriptor
        Returns:
        true iff references of the end point descriptor exist

      • add

        void add(com.ibm.team.links.common.registry.IEndPointDescriptor endPointDescriptor,
       com.ibm.team.links.common.IReference reference)
        Adds the given reference to the given end point descriptor. The reference must be new and not be part of a ILink already.
        Parameters:
        endPointDescriptor - the end point descriptor
        reference - the reference

      • remove

        void remove(com.ibm.team.links.common.IReference reference)
        Removes the given reference. Has no effect if the reference is not part of the references.
        Parameters:
        reference - the reference

      • set

        void set(com.ibm.team.links.common.registry.IEndPointDescriptor endPointDescriptor,
       com.ibm.team.links.common.IReference reference)
        Removes all references from the given end point descriptor and adds the given reference if not null. The reference must be new and not be part of a ILink already.
        Parameters:
        endPointDescriptor - the end point descriptor
        reference - the reference or null

      • getChangedReferenceTypes

        java.util.List<com.ibm.team.links.common.registry.IEndPointDescriptor> getChangedReferenceTypes()
        Returns all end point descriptors of references that were changed.
        Returns:
        the list of IEndPontDescriptors that have changed, never null
        Since:

        Returns:
        the added references of the end point descriptor, never null

      • deleteAttachment

        void deleteAttachment(IAttachmentHandle attachment)
        Deletes an attachment from the repository. Does not fail if attachment is null or does not exist.
        Parameters:
        attachment - Attachment to be deleted

      • getDeletedAttachments

        java.util.List<IAttachmentHandle> getDeletedAttachments()
        Returns the attachments to be deleted from the repository.
        Returns:
        List of deleted attachments, cannot be null
